title: "stats-snack"

Stats Snack is a weekly meeting on Zoom for students and faculty at UMass Boston to discuss random topics, address questions, ask for advice, or attend/host workshops/talks related to statistics/anything data-related!

See [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U90DD1gmx9riJ2uYar72f_p2ifWZoKbu6zm7jRGefzI/edit?usp=sharing) for the weekly agenda.

We are always looking for fun workshops and presentations. Also - it looks cool on a resume or CV to have a talk at a club about statistics 8) reach out to Candice (candice.koolhaas001\@umb.edu) if you have an idea for a topic or workshop, or if you have some fun educational links we can add to the website.

Stats Snack 2025-2026 is hosted by [Candice Koolhaas](https://candicekoolhaas.github.io/), a PhD student in the Developmental and Brain Sciences program.
